Abstract:
Technical Education- Declaration of probation- Shri. Jawahar Ali Khan H,
*Accounts Officer, Govt. Engineering College, Painavu, Idukki- Orders issued.
Order Issued By:
(By order of the Governor)
C AJAYAN
ADDITIONAL SECRETARY
Body Para:
In the circumstances reported by the Director of Technical Education, as
per the letter read above, Government are pleased to declare that Shri. Jawahar
Ali Khan H, Accounts Officer, Govt. Engineering College, Painavu, Idukki has
successfully completed his period of probation in the post of Accounts Officer
in the scale of pay of Rs. 42500-87000 with effect from 17.01.2019 as per

- provisions in the KS&SSRs.
References:
Read 1 Letter No. ED4/13434/19/DTE dated 06.08.2020 from the Director
of Technical Education, Thiruvananthapuram.
